title: NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers
text:
NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers Post to Facebook NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers Check out this story on 13newsnow.com: http://on.wvec.com/1RUGEGl Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers NFL and Bruce Smith honor the Bookers 13News Now 6:14 p.m. EDT October 20, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The NFL recognized Booker T. Washington in a nationwide Super Bowl High School Honor Roll initiative that recognizes schools and communities that contributed to Super Bowl history and positively impacted the game of football. 
Two former Bookers were on an active super bowl roster... Former Buffalo Bills DE, four-time Super Bowl participant and Hall of Famer, Bruce Smith and former New York Jes DB and Super Bowl champion, Cornell Gordon. 
Booker T. Washington is one of the four schools in Norfolk being honored in this program. Read or Share this story: http://on.wvec.com/1RUGEGl TOP VIDEOS
